attributes.action: Carry out random inspections of sights where roadworks take place, so that they dont work 2 hours a day and claim a full day's pay.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have started this petition to campaign about lazy roadworkers. They work a few hours a day and have stupidly long tea breaks. I feel that the Government should carry out random inspections on roadworks to determine whether workers are carrying out repairs. The subsequent workers or contractors should be banned if they do not ork enough hours to drag out repairs to earn more money for doing less work.
